casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Paul Dewayne CUMMINGS. No. 1A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of April 2006 by Defendant to Bypass the Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of April 2006."
